item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 8, 2024 at 1:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Asterogue, my sci-fi roguelike, is now playable on the web (12 points | 10 comments)
2. Perceptually lossless (talking head) video compression at 22kbit/s (86 points | 45 comments)
3. LoRA vs. Full Fine-Tuning: An Illusion of Equivalence (51 points | 5 comments)
4. A New Era of macOS Sandbox Escapes: Overlooked Attack Surface, 10+ New Vulns (5 points | discuss)
5. Why I love Rust for tokenising and parsing (203 points | 100 comments)
6. Claude Shannon: Mathematician, Engineer, Genius and Juggler? (47 points | 7 comments)
7. The 'Invisibility Cloak' – Slash-Proc Magic (3 points | discuss)
8. Launch HN: Codebuff (YC F24) – CLI tool that writes code for you (255 points | 211 comments)
9. Practical Radio Circuits (2003) [pdf] (83 points | 8 comments)
10. Λ-2D: An Exploration of Drawing as Programming Language (10 points | 6 comments)
11. Roaring Bitmap Compression (31 points | 3 comments)
12. Using Ghidra and Python to reverse engineer Ecco the Dolphin (412 points | 114 comments)
13. Functional ultrasound through the skull (208 points | 66 comments)
14. Sustainable Web Interest Group Is Formed (171 points | 73 comments)
15. AI for real-time fusion plasma behavior prediction and manipulation (255 points | 123 comments)
16. Mushroom Color Atlas (251 points | 25 comments)
17. Show HN: Draw.Audio – A musical sketchpad using the Web Audio API (144 points | 52 comments)
18. Methodology is bullshit: principles for product velocity (174 points | 91 comments)
19. I'm not mutable, I'm partially instantiated (207 points | 64 comments)
20. Understanding privacy risk with k-anonymity and l-diversity (32 points | 4 comments)
21. QNX is now free for anything non-commercial, plus there's an RPi image (596 points | 276 comments)
22. Intentrace: Strace for Everyone (20 points | 1 comment)
23. Hyperlight: Virtual machine-based security for functions at scale (128 points | 21 comments)
24. Show HN: BemiDB – Postgres read replica optimized for analytics (189 points | 99 comments)
25. Linux Syscall Support (187 points | 102 comments)
26. The Brothers Grimm: A Biography (65 points | 16 comments)
27. FDA Proposes Ending Use of Oral Phenylephrine as OTC Nasal Decongestant (103 points | 71 comments)
28. Excerpts from a conversation about personal information management (171 points | 75 comments)
29. Show HN: Directional antenna alignment using phone motion sensors (58 points | 11 comments)
30. Imaging shapes of atomic nuclei in high-energy nuclear collisions (49 points | 4 comments)
